title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Disease Outbreak
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A medical student who dismissed early symptoms as travel fatigue becomes patient zero in a hostel pandemic outbreak, dying alone in quarantine after infecting dozens.

death_teaser: She thought she knew better. The virus disagreed.
